title: Daniels Broiler
copy: Located in the beautiful Pacific Northwest, this chain of exclusive steakhouses promises an unforgettable dining experience for meat lovers and wine connoisseurs alike.

title: Outback Steakhouse
copy: From their famous bloomin' onion appetizer to their succulent steaks, grilled chicken, and seafood entrees, there's something for everyone on the menu at Outback.

title: Metropolitan Grill
copy: Located in Seattle, Washington, known for its premium cuts of meat, extensive wine list, and sophisticated dining atmosphere.

title: Anthony's HomePort
copy: located in Des Moines, Washington, known for its fresh and delicious seafood dishes and breathtaking waterfront views.

title: Seastar
copy: located in Bellevue, Washington, known for its fresh and locally sourced ingredients, the menu features a wide range of seafood dishes, including raw bar items, sushi, and grilled fish.

title: John Howie Steak
copy: An upscale Bellevue steakhouse renowned for its prime cuts of beef, expert preparation, and elegant ambiance. A must-visit for steak enthusiasts and special occasions.

title: Roka
copy: Roka, nestled in the heart of Galataport, Istanbul, offers a culinary journey that beautifully combines the flavors of Japan with a modern twist
